text: Mark Odom Hatfield (July 12, 1922 â€“ August 7, 2011) was an American politician and educator. He was a Republican, even though he mostly voted with Democratic senators. He was born in Dallas, Oregon. From 1957 to 1959, he was the Oregon Secretary of State. From 1959 to 1967, he was the Governor of Oregon. Between 1967 to 1997, Hatfield was the United States Senator from Oregon. Hatfield died in Portland, Oregon on August 7, 2011 at the age of 89. ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2011 deaths Category:Academics from Oregon Category:American political activists Category:American political writers Category:Lawyers from Portland, Oregon Category:American military personnel of World War II Category:Governors of Oregon Category:United States senators from Oregon Category:Politicians from Portland, Oregon Category:Writers from Portland, Oregon Category:Businesspeople from Portland, Oregon Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Mark Hatfield
